File.name: load
File.tooltip: Click to load an image into the viewer. This will allow you to select an image file from your system to display.

File.name: save
File.tooltip: Click to save the current layer to a file. This will store the layer as a separate image file on your system.

File.name: load_layer
File.tooltip: Click to load a new layer on top of the existing image. This allows you to add additional content or annotations to the image.

File.name: unload_layer
File.tooltip: Click to remove the currently selected layer from the image. This will leave only the base image or other layers you wish to keep.

Tools.name: move
Tools.tooltip: Click to activate Move mode. This allows you to move the image around in the viewer by dragging it.

Tools.name: reset_move_zoom
Tools.tooltip: Click to reset the image's position and zoom level to the default view.

Labeling.name: contour_filling
Labeling.tooltip: Click to activate Move mode. This allows you to move the image around in the viewer by dragging it.

Labeling.name: paintbrush
Labeling.tooltip: Click to reset the image's position and zoom level to the default view.

Labeling.name: magic_pen
Labeling.tooltip: Click to activate Move mode. This allows you to move the image around in the viewer by dragging it.

Labeling.name: rectangle
Labeling.tooltip: Click to reset the image's position and zoom level to the default view.

Labeling.name: polygon
Labeling.tooltip: Click to activate Move mode. This allows you to move the image around in the viewer by dragging it.

Edit.name: undo
Edit.tooltip: Click to undo the last drawing action or modification.

Edit.name: eraser
Edit.tooltip: Click to activate the eraser tool, allowing you to erase parts of the image or layer.

Edit.name: clear_all
Edit.tooltip: Click to clear all layers and reset the image to its original state.

Edit.name: hide_show_label_shortcut
Edit.tooltip: Click to hide/show all label property dialogs or select specific ones.

Edit.name: opacity
Edit.tooltip: Click to toggle opacity mode, allowing you to adjust the transparency of layers.
